increase_mining_screen_long_text: Users can increase their mining rate through referring more users to dotchain network. Your mining rate depends on your referrals account status, they must have been active in the last 24hours

Mining rate will be increased for each 
 active miner
increase_mining_screen_mining_rate_decre: Mining rate will be decreased if your referal isn't active  for the past 24hours Or logged out from the app
earn_dot_gold_screen_long_text_one: Ace is the secondary token built in the dot blockchain network. Users can earn ACE only by playing games in the dotchain app
earn_dot_gold_screen_long_text_two: After the launch of mainnet, users can move dot coins to a web based web3 wallet,  at that instant we can migrate limited number of miners to mainnet wallet in a daily basis. Migration will be proceeded on the basis of ACE balance
